pages.text: $(li)The Tripwire Hook is a placeable block that is capable of detect players, creatures, or even items.$(br)$(li)First you need to place two Tripwire Hook lined up.

$(li)Now just right click on them while you are holding $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/string)String$(/l) on your hand.$(br)$(li)Now if any creature touch the almost invisible string, the Tripwire Hook will emit a redstone signal pulse.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft a Trapped Chest in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/fletcher)Fletchers$(/l) will exchange a Tripwire Hook by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
